summary: Sets OpenAI API base, key, and model for GPTCommit, then installs configuration. Ensures periodic updates without overloading.

details.comment: Sets OpenAI API base, key, and model for GPTCommit, then installs configuration. Ensures periodic updates without overloading.
details.content:
gptcommit config set --local openai.api_base "https://api.chatanywhere.com.cn/v1"
gptcommit config set --local openai.api_key "sk-CXMgNasrAvxNDYDTVE1LZtJvTWEF5scC6OvHhbTe1i016urg"
gptcommit config set --local openai.model "gpt-3.5-turbo"
gptcommit install
@REM ensure that we do this in regular interval. do not do this too fast.
